author: joes
msg: Don't open the destination file (which will clobber a preexisting file) unless the source podfile actually exists.

author: joes
msg: Use -I$base_dir/glue/perl/xs to find the (generated) xs headers instead of the ../../.. guesswork.

author: wrowe
msg: Back out a bit of the bogus commit 1.22 - which removed the -release-
mode flag /incremental:no.  /debug enables this option, but this opt
also increases the size of the binaries as they are 'rebuildable'.
Since devstudio thinks -release- builds are non-debug, already with
this option it will optimize away this flag in the IDE :(

author: jerenkrantz
msg: Note fix for httpd-2.0 as well.
